message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a price of $925,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe the product's true value warrants a higher price. I'm willing to come down slightly to $890,000. This offer represents a significant discount on the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to come down in price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $860,000.
